name: Stuck With The Humans
description:
You are an alien stuck in earth until you get enough orbs to go back home.

Consume people`s body to gain time while you are looking for orbs around the buildings

LEFT-CLICK to consume a body

W-A-S-D , or arrows to move

SPACE BAR to jump or fly(must be pressed more than once)

Would you be able to gain all 5 orbs?
